name: Noa and The Lost Hat(Alpha)
description:
*the project is still in  it's alpha stage so expect to see a few bugs*

A newbie magician accidentally spills a potion on his hat which made the hat grow feet and run away. Now he must travel different places to find it while practicing/learning spells on the way.

Controls:

> A/D or Left and Right Arrow keys = move

> Spacebar = Jump

> Hover on the a card with your cursor = Select a card

> Left Click while hovering = Activate card

Tools:

Game Engine: Godot

Art tool: Aseprite
